General.Name: Glacier Lake Resources Inc
General.Description: Glacier Lake Resources Inc., a resource exploration company, focuses on acquiring and exploring resource properties. The company was formerly known as Killdeer Minerals Inc. and changed its name to Glacier Lake Resources Inc. in February 2017. Glacier Lake Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 750 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T7
